verses.roman:
śrīvatsa paṇḍita, brahmacārī haridāsa
puruṣottama brahmacārī, āra kṛṣṇadāsa

synonyms: śrīvatsa paṇḍita—of the name Śrīvatsa Paṇḍita; brahmacārī haridāsa—of the name Haridāsa Brahmacārī; puruṣottama brahmacārī—of the name Puruṣottama Brahmacārī; āra—and; kṛṣṇadāsa—of the name Kṛṣṇadāsa.
translation: Śrīvatsa Paṇḍita, Haridāsa Brahmacārī, Puruṣottama Brahmacārī and Kṛṣṇadāsa were the twenty-fifth, twenty-sixth, twenty-seventh and twenty-eighth branches of Advaita Ācārya.
